text: John Gargan (6 June 1928 – 4 February 2007) was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Cliftonville. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Sportspeople from York Category:2007 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Gargan (footballer)
